閾刺激: (いきしげき) - threshold stimulus; liminal stimulus
闃寂: (げきじゃく) - silent and still; desolate
闃然: (げきぜん) - quiet and still; without sign of life
闇: (yami) - escuridão, trevas, o escuro; confusão, desespero, desesperança; lugar escondido, segredo, esquecimento; mercado negro, comércio obscuro, transações clandestinas, canais ilegais
闇々: (やみやみ) - without one's knowledge; easily
闇い: (くらい) - dark/gloomy; dark (in colour)/dull; depressed/dispirited; sorrowful/bitter (as in a dark past); unclear/unfamiliar/unknown
闇から闇に葬る: (やみからやみにほうむる) - to cover up; to hush up; to shroud in darkness
闇に紛れて: (やみにまぎれて) - under cover of night
闇を透かす: (やみをすかす) - to peer into the darkness
闇カルテル: (やみカルテル) - unauthorized cartel; unauthorised cartel
闇サイト: (やみサイト) - illegal website (i.e. websites featuring child pornography, selling drugs, etc.); website encouraging illegal activities; suicide-encouraging website
闇価格協定: (やみかかくきょうてい) - illegal price-fixing agreement
闇再販: (やみさいはん) - price-support measures for contraband goods
闇取り引き: (やみとりひき) - illegal or black-market transaction; secret deal
闇取引: (やみとりひき) - illegal or black-market transaction; secret deal
闇夜に烏: (やみよにからす) - something indistinct; a crow in a pitch-black night
闇夜に鉄砲: (やみよにてっぽう) - aimless attempt; shot in the dark
闇夜の烏: (やみよのからす) - something indistinct; a crow in a pitch-black night
闇夜の礫: (やみよのつぶて) - aimless attempt; shot in the dark
闇夜の鉄砲: (やみよのてっぽう) - aimless attempt; shot in the dark
闇将軍: (やみしょうぐん) - power behind the throne; éminence grise; kingmaker; wire-puller; shadow shogun
闇屋: (やみや) - black marketeer; black market trader
闇打ち: (やみうち) - attacking under the cover of darkness; surprise attack
闇汁: (やみじる) - stew prepared from ingredients contributed by members of a party, and eaten in the dark for fun
闇献金: (やみけんきん) - illegal donation; secret contribution
闇社会: (やみしゃかい) - underground world; underground society
闇穴: (あんけつ) - dark hole; idiot/fool; historical road
闇穴道: (あんけつどう) - road taken by a Chinese ajari buddhist monk when he incurred the wrath of emperor Genso (685-762)
闇討ち: (やみうち) - attacking under the cover of darkness; surprise attack
闇金: (やみきん) - black-market lending; illegal loan
闇金融: (やみきんゆう) - black-market lending; illegal loan
闇鍋: (やみなべ) - stew prepared from ingredients contributed by members of a party, and eaten in the dark for fun
闇闇: (やみやみ) - without one's knowledge; easily
闇雲: (yamikumo) - imprudente, aleatório, sem método, às cegas, súbito, abrupto
闊歩: (かっぽ) - striding/swaggering/strutting; lording it over others/acting as though one owns the place/throwing one's weight around
闊達自在: (かったつじざい) - (yoji) broad-minded and free in disposition; large-hearted and not scrupulous about trifles
闌ける: (たける) - to excel at/to be proficient at; to grow old; to ripen; to rise high (e.g. the sun)
闌れる: (すがれる) - to wither (esp. plants as winter draws near)/to fade/to shrivel; to pass one's prime/to start deteriorating/to begin to decline
闌干: (らんかん) - guardrail/handrail/bannister/balustrade/parapet; (欄干, 闌干 only)  (a person) shining like the stars or moon/(a person) crying endlessly
闕く: (かく) - to chip/to nick/to break/to crack; to lack
闕ける: (かける) - to be chipped/to be damaged/to be broken; to be lacking/to be missing; to be insufficient/to be short/to be deficient/to be negligent toward; (also 虧ける) (of the moon) to wane/to go into eclipse
闕所: (けっしょ) - confiscation of property (Edo period)
闕腋: (けつえき) - unstitched, open side of some traditional Japanese clothing/clothing with such an open side; robe worn by military officials with a round collar, unstitched open sides and no ran
闕腋の袍: (けってきのほう) - robe worn by military officials with a round collar, unstitched open sides and no ran
闘い: (たたかい) - battle; fight; struggle; conflict
闘う: (たたかう) - (esp. 戦う) to make war (on)/to wage war (against)/to go to war (with)/to fight (with)/to do battle (against); (esp. 戦う) to compete (against); (esp. 闘う) to struggle (against adversities, etc.)/to fight/to contend/to resist
闘わす: (たたかわす) - to compete/to vie/to contend; to make fight against another (person, animal)/to pit against/to set against; to debate/to argue
闘争心: (とうそうしん) - belligerence; fighting spirit
闘志を燃やす: (とうしをもやす) - to burn with combativeness
闘志満々: (とうしまんまん) - (yoji) brimming with fighting spirit; being strong in the will to fight; burning with combativeness
闘志満満: (とうしまんまん) - (yoji) brimming with fighting spirit; being strong in the will to fight; burning with combativeness
闘牛場: (とうぎゅうじょう) - a bullring
闘病: (とうびょう) - fighting against an illness
闘病生活: (とうびょうせいかつ) - (means and time spent) fighting against an illness
闡明: (せんめい) - make clear; explicate; explain
